unnormalised: Arre yaar, India vs Pak match kab hai? I heard it's on 15/10/2024, but some are saying it's preponed to 14th Oct. And what time, bhai? Is it a day-night match starting at 2:30 PM IST like last time, or something else? Need to book my leave from office ASAP!
normalised: Arre yaar, India versus Pak match kab hai? I heard it's on fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four, but some are saying it's preponed to fourteenth October. And what time, bhai? Is it a day-night match starting at two thirty P-M I-S-T like last time, or something else? Need to book my leave from office A-S-A-P!
